website_summaries.verdict: Deals with a wider array of digestive issues, but has a few drawbacks overall, which should be considered before buying.
pros: Contains a proprietary blend of digestive enzymes to help deal with a host of issues from constipation to gas and bloating
cons: Caused cramps in some, and did not metabolize well
Some noted a rise in irregularity

customer_reviews.title: Miracle!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried everything... pysillum husk, other enzymes, fiber, stool softner, linzess, slippery elm bark, probiotics etc. u name it I’ve tried it! THIS is a miracle in a jar! I suffer major chronic constipation and seriously all doctors have said you will just have to live with having ONE BM a month n that I have (of course) irritable bowel -constipation. This has saved me... days when I feel the worst I take 1 with all meals and one extra before bed... a wah la! I hope this helps someone else who has been down this same road!!
customer_reviews.author: Denielle

customer_reviews.title: Love these probiotics
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a godsend! I take it before meals three times per day and my digestive health has improved incredibly. I used to eat antacids like they were candy, and stool softeners to keep me regular. After lowering my intake of simple carbs and taking these probiotics regularly, I am having much better quality of life. They've even helped me lose some weight. Thank-you.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: These digestive enzymes help me in several ways. They ...
customer_reviews.text: These digestive enzymes help me in several ways. They balance your gut flora, help end heartburn, bloating & discomfort, but also improve my immune system & decrease joint inflammation from my arthritis, which cuts down my pain. Enzymes & probiotics are more important to me than a daily vitamin. I take these along with other similar supplements every day. They're all natural, no side effects, unlike so many prescription medications.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Sky

customer_reviews.title: This product is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWESOME!!!!! Digestive and gut issues gone. it is balancing my digestion.....no more heartburn, acid reflux etc... I combine this product with diluted ACV/Lemon water. AWESOME. NO MEDICATION FOR ME.
customer_reviews.author: T.B., MI

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Gave me horrific gas to the point where it hurt the breathe. Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give these more stars! I have been dealing with digestive problems, mainly constipation, my entire life and have tried so many different enzymes and probiotics. Many didn't seem to be working until these! Ive been taking them for about a month and feel amazing and have not been constipated once! I love that they are vegan capsules and whole plant based, plus cheap! These are one of the best things I have bought and I highly reccomend for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlynn Griem

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Since gallbladder surgery diarrhea is a way of life as I struggle to digest my meals and don't have the luxury of eating small frequent meals. This product has made a huge difference. The diarrhea is gone, but I have also noticed that my energy is improving and the prior gas issues are gone as well. Wish I knew about this year's ago
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Harness

customer_reviews.title: These enzymes have saved me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been throwing up daily for months. Specialists cant find anything wrong with me so I have made an appointment at Mayo Clinic. I was researcing about digestion and the topic of enzymes came up. I looked up enzymes and found them on Amazon. I have stopped vomiting completely. yes Im still going to Mayo- but this product has saved me and I will be taking it for the rest of my life. That is how much I believe in this product. It saved me! Its so nice not throwing up. what a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Let’s wait and see...
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this product only two weeks ago and I like the effect so far. I noticed that I’m not gassy anymore and no longer experience the symptoms of IBS. Also, there is one thing that happens about 30 minutes after I eat too much of carbs (breads, cakes, pastries, etc), I go to the bathroom and do #2. Sorry guys, that’s was too much information, but since I’m doing a product review here, I want to be as honest as possible. It looks like the digestive enzymes are doing what they’re supposed to do. So there it is for now. Let’s wait another two weeks and see what happens next.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Enzymes...
customer_reviews.text: These pills have worked wonders.. My husband has had chronic diarrhea for the past 9 months due to chemo and after several apppointments with the Gastroentrologist, she still was not able to pinpoint the problem or able to prescribe anything to stop the diarrhea I took it upon myself to order these pills along with some probiotics, and for the first time in 9 months he is able to eat without his meals going right theough him. These pills are Awesome.. My husband calls them "the miracle pills".. I recommend them and give these enzymes a thunbs up..
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Gonzalez Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Had adverse effects. In stead of helping, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Had adverse effects. In stead of helping , it caused more gas, and cramps.. I went back to digest gold , which works.. u get what u pay for
customer_reviews.author: darth

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many other brands of digestive enzymes due to chronic digestive issues including severe bloating ,gas and heartburn . Zenwise Digestive enzymes are the ones I recommend. Since using these my symptoms have disappeared and have managed to lose some weight I give these a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Margomorales

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly do not believe most of the 5 star reviews. This actually made my IBS even more noticeable. Literally bought it three days ago and stomach noice grew even louder. I would not recommend this....
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Loving these, I do t have to take as many as I did with other brands. Really helps with gas and bloating, especially with me being a vegetarian. My new favorite, great quantity for the price too! On my 2nd bottle and referred them to family members. We're happy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Horrible side effect!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a couple of weeks and I'm having the worst/most painful cystic acne breakout on my chin. I eat a healthy diet, drink plenty of water and exercise so the only thing that has changed is adding this product. They also gave me gas. I stopped using it a few days ago in hopes that my chin will clear up. I'm so disappointed since these enzymes were highly rated on Amazon and I had such high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Easy to swallow pill, no funny smells or tastes as with some I've taken in the past. The lighter color pill is this enzyme, the darker one is a standard size pill from the store. So they're not horse pills but decent size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Happier tummy
customer_reviews.text: I believe these Digestive Enzymes are really helping. I am close to finishing my first bottle so I already ordered more. I have dealt with GERD and other tummy troubles like gas and bloating for years. A lot due to medications I have to take. But since starting the enzymes it is much better. Not totally gone but maybe with time will get even better. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: C. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!  Talk to your DR. 1st!!!
customer_reviews.text: This garbage sent me to the E.R.!! Gave me the worst hunger pains I've ever experienced & caused me to dry heave, but then instantly turned into bad stomach cramps the moment I took a bite of anything! Also led to chills while sweat dripped from my head... not to mention the spastic diarrhea! I eventually found myself unable to take my heart & diabetes meds after a couple weeks of taking this garbage!! buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Not the best- look for others
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but I decided to review this product because it did absolutely nothing for me. I've been having digestive issues for several years now, and so I bought this on a recommendation.. hoping that it would relieve some digestive pains and help mend my gut. However, when I took the recommended amount, my digestion quickly worsened. Bought this for the price, but wasn't worth it. There are definitely different products out there that has helped me much more. Would like a refund if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHELLFISH ALLERGY WARNING
customer_reviews.text: I WISH I COULD ADD NO STARS! WARNING: THIS PRODUCT CONTAINS SHELLFISH! There are no obvious warning labels no extra info. I am deathly allergic to shellfish and this could have sent me straight to the ER or even worse. please please don’t take this if you have an allergy to shellfish. I genuinely thought these were plant based and I’m so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Howl

customer_reviews.title: Makes digestion worse!
customer_reviews.text: These pills made gas and bloating worse. I seemed to have trapped gas in my intestines with these and it was sometimes painful. I thought maybe it was the pre and probiotics starting to work and fix my digestive issues so I took most the whole bottle as it suggests on the label, one pill with each meal. The day after I stopped taking them I was so much better, it’s been a week since I stopped and I fell great compared to when I was taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Finally relief from bloating and pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have IBS. Over the last few years I have been dealing with painful bloating, gas, cramps, diarrhea, constipation, and most recently reflux. I was on prescription medication that didn’t really help. I lived off of Gas X chewables. I got fed up and decided to try these after reading an article online. It’s helped get rid of the pain. I still get gassy sometimes but it’s not trapped and I can go to the bathroom regularly and it’s normal! Sometimes I forget to take it until after my meal and I’ve still been fine. My only complaint is it’s a little hard for me to swallow and sometimes the pill feels like it’s caught in my throat.
customer_reviews.author: minimamba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I feel I got very lucky choosing ZenWise digestive enzymes - there are so many companies out there, it is hard to pick one, but I chose ZenWise and am so satisfied with the result. I have suffered chronic stomach pain, bloating and cramping for years, and it was getting so bad I could barely eat anything without immediately getting a stomach ache. Since taking these enzymes, all of my discomfort is gone, I can eat comfortably, I am more regular, and the constant stomach bloat has gone down. These digestive enzymes are now a "must-have" in my supplement regimen. I cannot recommend them highly enough to anyone going through digestive issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Take it a few minutes before eating
customer_reviews.text: Took it for 2 days and didn't think it worked at all. I was still getting gas, bloating, and discomfort with almost every meal. Then I thought I'd try taking it about 5 minutes before eating, instead of when I started to eat. What a difference! Now, almost all of my symptoms have gone away, or is greatly minimized. If this product is not working for you, try taking it a few minutes before eating with some water.
customer_reviews.author: xliderider

customer_reviews.title: Allergy warning
customer_reviews.text: Shellfish allergy warning! Several people have had serious reactions, including myself. The product is mislabeled as vegan and claims to not contain shellfish when it does. The company will not converse with me. I am planning a suit against them for mislabeling ingredients as well as Amamzon for not vetting 3rd party vendors and causing serious bodily injury.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Label on ad is different from bottle I received
customer_reviews.text: Label on ad is different from bottle I received >>> first 2 pictures are from bottle I received & the last photo is from the ad by seller
customer_reviews.author: enola

customer_reviews.title: The company changed the formula-smells like fish and stinks
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so here’s the deal. I’ve been taking this supplement for quite some time now, at least two years. I’ve noticed that they’ve not only changed the bottle, but also the formula for the pill. Every time I go to open the bottle, it smells like fish and makes me want to gag. Every time I get ready to take the pill, it stinks and makes me want to gag. I’ve also noticed that the pill capsule now contains a yellow powder, where’s before it was a white powder. What happened to my favorite digestive enzyme/probiotic?
customer_reviews.author: J. Stagliano

customer_reviews.title: Increased bal movements, without causing diaherria
customer_reviews.text: I take opioids (Rx pain medicine) since back surgery...the major side effect is constipation. Since I started taking these digestive enzymes I have more regular bal movements. I had been suffering from IBS prior to surgery, I wish I had known about this product... I've tried other products and this is by far the best! I usually take one capsule a day, but on occasion I take two if I'm feeling uncomfortable. I have not experienced diaherria using this... Give it a try, I hope it works as well for you!
customer_reviews.author: George W.😎

customer_reviews.title: A flatulence booster of enormous proportions.
customer_reviews.text: Got the worse case of farts you could imagine. Was at a funeral and they thought someone died. It was extremely embarrasing. My wife made me sleep on the couch for 4 days it was so bad. Maybe it is just me but I thought this was supposed to help your digestion.
customer_reviews.author: UpState NYer

customer_reviews.title: I take it as recommended and have been using it for almost three months
customer_reviews.text: I no longer suffer from bloating, constipation, gas, and stomach cramps! I take it as recommended and have been using it for almost three months. Took about one week before I noticed a change in my daily bowel movement, as well as my overall well being. I am very pleased with my purchase! I will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Margie T.

customer_reviews.title: I am ecstatic to have found this product.
customer_reviews.text: This worked for me immediately. I was having miserable digestion issues... nausea, Indigestion, gas, discomfort, exhaustion--and worry. I did not want to go to an MD unless absolutely necessary, so I extensively researched my symptoms. I found this product listed on a holistic health website, read the reviews and ordered. I started taking one pill before meals the day it arrived and the next day felt better than I had felt in weeks. The stomach rumbling and gas decreased and indigestion subsided. Thankfully, regularity returned. I have added this item to my subscription orders. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: N. Salmons

customer_reviews.title: Unknown allergy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m only allergic to penicillins that I know of... this product made my lips breakout with hives. I started it on a Monday and Tuesday my lips felt very dry and chapped and Wednesday I had tiny bumps all over and the corners were cracked. So I stopped the product and used medicated chapstick to help heal them and it went away by the weekend. I had only used 3 capsules and my lips broke out, this had never happened to me.not sure what is in this product but I don’t recommend it. I returned and got my money back. This is the first time I’ve ever written a review because I feel others should know this before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: zolson@wgu.edu

customer_reviews.title: Has greatly helped my stomach issues!
customer_reviews.text: I have extreme reflux and IBS-D. The Omeprazole I am required to take upsets my stomach so I take this and a probiotic. So far since starting these enzymes I have had less stomach issues. I don't know if it is specifically due to these, but I am not going to stop my routine anytime soon as it has worked! Worth a try if you have stomach problems. Not a cure, but could help in combination with other stuff or a change in diet. Please click the "Helpful" button below if you read this review!
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: My first bottle was great. My second bottle was great. My third bottle came yesterday. These were brown where the others had been white I took one with dinner last night it was a terrible night and it’s 4 pm and I’m still in bed. SO sick at my stomach like never before. I believe there is poison in these pills. Will not ever take another one.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Saved my life from acid reflux!!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE never stop making this product!! Like the thousands others here, IT SAVED ME from years of the worst acid reflux ever. I saw every type of doctor, did a full endoscopy and colonoscopy, tried all the meds. Nothing worked. Then one beautiful day this popped up in my Amazon recommendations and I took a leap of faith. GONE within the month with no diet changes. THANK YOU. I will never stop taking these!!
customer_reviews.author: RYDEN

customer_reviews.title: Quality enzyme products will use the standard FCC units, not weight!
customer_reviews.text: All measurements listed are in mg (weight). This tells you nothing about what you're getting. Wish I would have done more thorough research before purchasing. "Quality enzyme products will use the standard FCC (Food Chemical Codex) units of measurement which establishes activity levels for the enzymes." Not weight!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Caused SEVERE WEIGHT GAIN and Worsened CONSTIPATION!
customer_reviews.text: This product, unlike the probiotics given to me by my gastroenterologist only made my constipation worse. In fact, caused SEVERE WEIGHT GAIN. Two bowel movements in 6 weeks! I’m also horrified to read contains shellfish as I am vegan. IBS, Crohn’s, constipation all worsened. I can’t recommend. Bought two bottles. Wasted time, health, and money.
customer_reviews.author: teena

customer_reviews.title: love these enzymes
customer_reviews.text: love these enzymes. Love that there are probiotics and prebiotics along with supplements that combat candida. I had a really messy gallbladder removal a few years ago which totally destroyed my gut. Discovered these and its helped me TREMENDOUSLY. I take them twice a day with breakfast and dinner (not with lunch). I follow up with a daily vitamin and fish oil and it seems to really help with digestion and vitamin absorption. If I get lazy and forget to take these I can feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: JANE

customer_reviews.title: Gas, gas and more gas
customer_reviews.text: Oh dear......I really wanted to like this supplement, in fact I have now tired on three separate occasions and get the same results.....unbelievable gas and bloating. The gas is horrific, I can’t even begin to describe it!! I’m giving it two stars because of my response to the supplement, which does seem in the minority, so I’m sure they work for some. Just wish I could return it, but I waited too long. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Severe allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of the few that had a severe allergic reaction* to this. Trouble breathing, horrific hives all over my entire body and face, etc. I'm not sure what's causing this in people but keep in mind when purchasing, it's definitely a possibility. *I have no known shellfish allergies, but I guess it's possible I've developed one over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: What Changed?
customer_reviews.text: The first time I brought this product I thought it was a lifesaver. I took one pill right before every meal and I felt like it really aided my digestion. When I ran out I was very eager to purchase another bottle. I don't know what happened or changed but my second bottle gave me a HORRIBLE reaction. Sever gastritis, painful bloating, stomach pain, and throat burn. I went to the gastro dr and they couldn't figure out what was going on since I was also taking acid reflux pills but eventually we figured out that it was these probiotics. Once I stopped using theses pills, my symptoms subsided. What the heck happened?
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Zenwise!! Probiotics are a TRUE helper!
customer_reviews.text: I am lactose intolerant and also have many acid reflux issues. I read about the benefits of probiotics and thought to give it a try. Zenwise Disgestive Enzymes are just AMAZING! I typically take them once a day during lunch time and it has helped me not only to have a better digestion, but also to loose weight! Seems like my metabolism has increased quite a lot and also gives me more energy. Definitely would recommend them over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy S

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps!
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced upper digestive issues for many years. They're not completely eliminated, but vastly improved by taking the Zenwize Digestive Enzymes. There are days when I'm not diligent in remembering to take the enzymes before every meal, and it is those days( nights) that I regret my forgetfulness because of painful bloating and sleeplessness. It is at times like that where I will take a capsule in the middle of the night to get my stomach to settle down; I'm usually feeling better within 30 minutes. It's worked for me and I have heartily recommended it to others who experience similar digestive issues.
customer_reviews.author: gymmom

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: My chiropracter gave me some digestive enzymes and they helped but were rather expensive. I tried these as an alternative and they work even better than the others. I was constantly bloated to the point that I would belch out the air from my stomach repeatedly and it even caused me to vomit on occasion. It has not happened since I have been taken these enzymes.
customer_reviews.author: Lyvie01

customer_reviews.title: Microcrystalline cellulose
customer_reviews.text: Their is a flow agent called microcrystalline cellulose. When it doesn't say vegetable source it comes from trees (sawdust). This additive is micro and can move in and out of any cell. We have no enzymes that will digest it. No wonder it causes gas and bloating. I have had no relief from my digestive issues and as others have said I've had extreme bloating and uncontrollable gas. I'll stick to pure supplements from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Enzyme
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with celiac disease several years ago and although I follow a gluten free diet I was still constantly bloated, gassy and irregular. I started taking these pills before every meal and within 3 days my stomach is flat as a board (I can see my abs again!), no more discomfort after eating, and I am regular!! I'm addicted, won't put anything in my mouth without these.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Headache
customer_reviews.text: Took first pill yesterday. Nothing has changed in my diet or daily routine except for taking one of these. I've had a headache going on two days now which is consistent with other reviews. Benefit of the doubt, my body may just not handle these well but man, is this headache terrible. May try one more time and have some Excedrin handy just in case.
customer_reviews.author: TheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Bad stomach pains and constipation
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a prebiotic + probiotic that helps with digestive problems. This one looked promising, but it only made my stomach issues worse. I made sure to drink lots of water and always take it with food, but I always ended up with stomach pains and constipation after taking this. I had to stop taking it after only a few days. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Great for My Ulcerative Colitis
customer_reviews.text: I take these digestive enzymes before EVERY Meal, and it has been a lifesaver. I have had ulcerative colitis for 8 years now. And have had a huge problem with absorbing nutrients. And am constantly vitamin deficient. Until I found this product! My blood work has come back much better singing using this product. I highly recommend this product for anyone who has an auto immune disease like Ulcerative colitis, thrones disease, lupus, leaky gut. Try for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Very good product at a reasonable price...
customer_reviews.text: Have used other brands of enzymes in the past but eventually became frustrated because they were either unavailable or the price fluctuated by over 200 percent from one order to the next. Now after using for several months, I can say that these are as good or better than any others that I have used, and at a reasonable price. I'm a believer in Zenwise now. Update 6/2017: Still use these with every meal, and can definitely tell if I accidentally missed a pill. I just wish that these were around 30 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Reality Check

customer_reviews.title: best bang for your buck in terms of digestive/anti bloating/ pro and pre biotic
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I saw them on poosh (lol thanks Kourt) but they are actually awesome. You get 180 tablets and only need one to get the job done so these last forever. Comparable products with the same ingredients or if anything only half of the ingredients in this one (making it so you have to get multiple products) cost the same or more for only 30 servings or so. I am going to continue repurchasing this forever because it has absolutely every digestion/ bloating related ingredient I could possibly ask for! 10000% would recommend
customer_reviews.author: niloufar

customer_reviews.title: Made bloating worse.
customer_reviews.text: I have had digestive issues for years now and was really hoping this product would help as it was so highly rated by thousands of people. And while it might very well work for others, it actually made my abdominal bloating and fullness worse. I gave it almost 2 weeks to see if my body perhaps needed to adjust to new enzymes, but even after 2 weeks, the bloating and abdominal fullness was still present and was worse than when I was not taking these pills. I am returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: iampidus

customer_reviews.title: Might cause GI distraction, gas, stomach heaviness
customer_reviews.text: By reading reviews I was sure that I will be happy with Zenwise health digestive enzymes, but I was wrong. From the first doses that I followed as instructed, I felt heaviness and gasses in my stomach, suffered from burps daily, right after each meal. I don’t think this product is safe and have ingredients that might cause GI problems. Definitely not recommend it, unless you want to take a health risk.
customer_reviews.author: Romaha

customer_reviews.title: New formula - terrible smell and taste, completely different appearance
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these enzymes for my mom, who has celiac and deals with constant stomach issues, after I had a great experience with the product. I was so excited to have my mom try them - and then I opened the bottle. It smelled horrible! I pulled out one of my old pills and compared to the new pill - completely different color, even a different shape, and when I smelled each one, the old pill had no scent and the new one is awful. I really loved this product and it really improved how I felt every day, but after this experience I’m sad to say I think I’ll need to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE! WORST BLOATING OF MY LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews. Unless they deserve 5 stars. I wish there was an option for 0 stars. I started taking these pills a couple days ago. I woke up the other morning to what looks like a pregnant belly, and I am not pushing out. I haven’t used the bathroom since starting the pills. My stomach has swelled up. I have the worst gas pains of my entire life, and my acid reflux has never been so bad. The pills went right into the trash, My stomach is slowly starting to go down after drinking about 30 bottles of water, and taking gas x, and stool softeners. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Lis

customer_reviews.title: Who knew pooping could be fun?
customer_reviews.text: Like... my poop is normal. Unicorns and glitter unnecessary. This is a magic digestion pill. I take once before meals. One before bed. One if I eat like a fat lady at the candy store, and I’m good. My life is changed. Buy them. Skip the unicorns and glitter. Even the pooping chair is needed no more. Stick to these magic pills. Thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Trauth

customer_reviews.title: Not a recommended buy
customer_reviews.text: This product did not help me as much as I had hoped. The only difference I noticed after taking these (and I took them before every meal consistently for three weeks) was that they gave me slight stomach discomfort after I took them. It felt like my stomach was upset, without all the usual symptoms of having one. Although, there are obviously infinite reasons why the body can feel out of whack, I personally would not recommend these enzymes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Gas Pain!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product! I mistakenly thought it was a probiotic but even after I recieved it and realized it wasn’t I had high hopes bc of the reviews. Unfortunately every single time I took this product the gas pains were almost unbearable! And while I was glad it did make me “go” the pain was not worth it! At one point I truly thought I’d have to go to the hospital that’s how bad the abdominal and intestinal pain was caused by this product
customer_reviews.author: Erica Canales

customer_reviews.title: Cost increase
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive. In the past I ordered 180 count for $21, approx. $0.12 per pill. That seemed about right. Now they do not appear to offer that option and the most is a 60 count for $15, approx. $0.25 per pill. More than double the price! I am not sure if they phased out the larger size or what but to double the price overnight is crazy.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Caused me to go hyperthyroid.
customer_reviews.text: The sales page did not list it has seaweed in it which contains iodine. I already suffer from hyperthyroid and iodine agitates it greatly and can take weeks for me to calm down. I took this thinking it was enzymes only, when my hyperthyroid symptoms returned I went back to examine the ingredients to only find out there is seaweed/iodine in the product. If I wanted seaweed I would of bought a seaweed product not a digestive enzyme.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: No Lipase and low levels of amylase and protease found per ConsumerLab.com
customer_reviews.text: Findings shown in headline are from a recent analysis of digestive enzymes by ConsumerLab.com. This product was the only one that failed to pass their tests. I have been using this product for several months and can't tell any difference with any of the brands that I have used. I will be switching to another brand soon.
customer_reviews.author: Larry from Tampa

customer_reviews.title: A shotgun approach rather than a focused product
customer_reviews.text: After reading the glowing reviews, I'm disappointed. I don't have any known gut issues but eat a lot of rice and noticed it was passing into my stool undigested. I can't chew very well (starch digestion begins with salivary amylase), so was hoping these would help. One capsule does nothing, so I went to 2, and am seeing only marginal improvement. I'm thinking a formula that just focused on delivering what I bought it for - digestive enzymes - without adding all the other ingredients in a shotgun approach to digestion, might work better, and allow each capsule to deliver more of what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Gas attack
customer_reviews.text: I took this on 3 occasions and had gas pain and multiple bathroom trips shortly after. I blamed it on something else until yesterday. The gas pain was so intense I almost went to ER. Ginger tea and antacids eventually eased it. The ingredients all appear to be beneficial but something in it is bad for whatever issues I have, it increased my symptoms instead of decreased. Bummer I was so hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: lionmandan

customer_reviews.title: Be mindful of allergies before taking this product.
customer_reviews.text: The first day was great! I felt good, gut wise. However, after a few days of taking this I started getting hives. I have had a terrible case of hives on my back and up to the base of my scalp causing intense itching. I have stopped taking them (of course) and the hives are slowly subsiding. Be mindful of allergens before taking this product, I have many allergies to different things and had read in a couple other review about shellfish allergies from this...which is why it affected me in this way.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure that these enzymes will work terrific for someone who doesn't have multiple digestive / colon ...
customer_reviews.text: These actually cause me to bloat, if I take 2 at a time. I didn't notice any immediate difference in my overall health, took about a month to notice more energy. I'm sure that these enzymes will work terrific for someone who doesn't have multiple digestive / colon issues. ( like myself ) They do help some with acid reflux.
customer_reviews.author: love2save

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: As someone who doesn't believe anything he sees, I tried this product and the majority of reviews are beyond accurate. I have had an "emergency" situation every morning for most of the last decade and within the first week almost ALL symptoms of inflammation, etc etc almost completely went away. By the second week I was a full convert. Buy this if you are looking at this page.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I have irritable bowel and Crohn’s disease - dairy and fresh veggies are terrible for me. If I take 1 capsule (sometimes 2 depending on how much fresh veggies I’m having) I can tolerate all the foods I love! So glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for you money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using probiotics everyday for years, and would definitely recommend this product if you take more than their recommended dose. Every once in awhile I attempt to try a new probiotic although, I always end up using this product again. I will say, I don’t notice much of a difference with the regular recommended dose, but if you take 2 capsules in the AM and one in the PM, you will notice a difference. After pricing other products out, I still believe this is a good deal (even if you take 3 a day) bc you get 120-ish capsules vs the normal 30 that most others offer.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bailey

customer_reviews.title: These have made a huge difference!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my midwife suggested I get some digestive enzymes for pregnancy indegestion/heart burn. I read a lot of reviews for other ones and these seemed to be the best. Now after using them daily for two months I can say they have really helped! I wasn't expecting this but certain foods that have always given me a slight tummy ache- don't cause one when I take these! And my heart burn went down dramatically as soon as I started taking them. I still get heartburn because a good amount of it is caused by gravity (like when I'm laying down) but the constant heart burn I was having during and after every meal has gone away.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Best Digestion Aid
customer_reviews.text: Since taking this prebiotic/probiotic, I no longer find it necessary to take my prescription Prilosec. I started taking Zenwise Health Digestive Enzymes a little over a year ago, and quit taking the Prilosec to see how the enzymes helped on their own. To my surprise and delight, I was able to give up the prescription after taking it for over 4 years. It's good to finally be able to quit taking a prescription for a much more healthy alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny K.

customer_reviews.title: No PILLS inside!!!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the bottle and all that was in it was a cotton ball and a do not eat moisture pack!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work. Only makes things worse!!
customer_reviews.text: I took it for at least two weeks straight. I also increased my fiber as well. I could not pass a bowel movement at all. Nothing. No feeling. Just pain and bloated. After taking a laxative to finally go after 4+ days of not a movement, I was able to go. I then spent another 4 days with no bowel movements. I decided to stop taking this product and continue my fiber. Sure enough 2 days after I stopped taking it I started having a bowel movement a day. I do NOT recommend this product at all. I will be throwing my bottle away.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t explain how amazing I think this stuff is,I had been suffering as a result of strong antibiotics but this stuff cured me!!I was freaking out thinking I had iBs but now I feel normal again
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Murray

customer_reviews.title: I really thought these were going to make a difference...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an enzyme with a probiotic. I was excited to finally find this product. Started taking the tablets about 5-10 minutes before my meals. I first started getting heartburn, then my throat & lungs started feeling scratchy. The scratchiness would feel better after taking Zyrtec. Shortly after that, my ears started throbbing. This is the only thing that had changed in my diet these last few weeks. I decided to stop taking them. I was ready to believe in this product..What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Product contains FODMAP: Inulin
customer_reviews.text: This product is supposedly designed to better digestion and support lactose intolerance. But inulin is present in this porduct and, like lactose, they are both FODMAP's. The inulin is this product is the last thing many of these people need to be taking! I must say that this product did not seem to improve my symptoms and seemingly led to increased frequency of diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: New formula- not the best anymore
customer_reviews.text: I used to LOVE this product- I’ve never had a probiotic that kept me feeling as good as this one. I took one with every meal and felt so good. I noticed that the packaging was different and the supplement looked different. I took it as a normally would and immediately knew it was a different formula. I kept up with it for the whole bottle and I just don’t feel the same as I used to. Like it’s a placebo?? It’s unfortunate. I’m back on the market for an effective probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: Try these enzymes, they’re amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many different product to combat IBS and this is the BEST! My sister told me about it so I ordered it right away. I’ve been taking it for about a week and the results are amazing. I truly think anyone dealing with stubborn digestive issues will benefit from these enzymes. I just hope they stay available!! You’ll be amazed at the relief you get from gas, bloating & not being “regular’. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Jane Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for IBS sufferers
customer_reviews.text: Life changing! I’ve struggled with IBS for 20 years. Been on a prescription antispasmodic for almost 10 years. Gluten-free and low lactose for 5 years. Follow a low FODMAP diet. Still struggled. Especially with extreme bloating, gas, and either constipation or diarrhea. Taking this capsule with meals has made a HUGE difference! I’m not 100% “cured” but I am sooo much more comfortable. Bloating and gas are minimal. Constipation and diarrhea are basically gone. I actually feel normal most of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Notable results
customer_reviews.text: I was always a regular customer of heart burns after dinner. The reflux wakes me at night many times and sometimes it keeps me awake until morning. I started taking these capsules once a day just before dinner for around 10 days. No reflux so far and no feeling of fullness after meals.
customer_reviews.author: Asad

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken many probiotics before, and still do, and I’ve never had the symptoms that these gave me. I’ve taken them 3 different times for an entire week to see if my body would adapt and the symptoms would pass. However the symptoms only got worse. As others mentioned, they give you terrible bloating and gas. My stomach always felt uneasy and I didn’t want to be far from a restroom after taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Appleby

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing for IBS and Ulcerative Colitis
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered from chronic IBS for decades and have tried to manage it with diet and lifestyle choices, but have always had bloating and puffiness and low energy. I'm a week in with taking one of these pills before a meal, and all I can say is that they are an absolute life changer! I feel like I'm getting more energy and digesting my food better, and my gas and bloating have decreased dramatically. I can actually focus on living my life instead of trying to worry about where the nearest bathroom is or being distracted by cramps from holding in gas. Never going back to the way life was before I found these supplements. Amazing, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I have IBS-C , this product not only it didn’t help me but it make my belly bloat terribly. Days later, my wife start taking it and it helps her constipation so i gave it a seccond chance and had the same terrible belly bloating and i don’t want to give another try anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Habita Suites

customer_reviews.title: Digestion issues after starting these probiotics.
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t notice anything special about these probiotics. I eat a vegetarian/vegan diet, I exercise & I occasionally have gas and bloating. However after starting these pills I began having recurrent digestion issues, bloating, gas, painful bowel movements, nausea, dry heaving. I didn’t think anything of it and chalked it up to stress. But I came to look at the reviews here and noticed others with the same issues. There seems to be some inconsistencies in the formula as some have great experiences and some do not. I would discourage anyone from buying these until they’re able to release a single formula so customers are not wasting there money!
customer_reviews.author: siani rivera

customer_reviews.title: Life changer.
customer_reviews.text: I have dealt with IBS with constipation for literally over 10 years, it has controlled my life. It effects my migraines, back pain, skin, etc. I have tried every probiotic on the planet, every diet, Food diary, specialists, physical therapy, etc. I have had blood work sigmoidoscopies, colonoscopies, etc. Th is is the ONLY thing that has ever given me any relief. I’ll admit it is sometimes hard to remember to take before every meal but I’m getting used to it. I’m so thankful for this product it has let me be able to enjoy my life again.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Allen

customer_reviews.title: New formula that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: i got these many times before and they worked great. Really changed my life. But now they've changed the formula and they dont work. They now look different and smell terrible. When you ask the company about the changes, they avoid the question at all costs. I will never waste money on these again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver for my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I was having multiple stomach issues related to chronic illness and medications, and it seemed like EVERYTHING I ate caused a reaction. I started taking these probiotics with every meal and my usually weird stomach started to become normal once again. I swear by these and have told everyone I know with digestive issues they should be taking them. Note that sometimes I take them immediately after a meal, though, because I find they help better with digestion.
customer_reviews.author: JenMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Celiacs Beware.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these supplements for my wife who has issues with her stomach. She is a diagnosed celiac and all of the benefits this supplement supposedly helped with, are the exact issues my wife has. Being that my wife needs to eat a gluten free diet, we keep a strict food diary in case she gets sick. The last three days my wife has been taken ill with the same symptoms of gluten poisoning. The only thing new introduced to her diet was these supplements. Very unfortunate, because we wanted these supplements to improve her quality of life, yet they did the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: mario A. Mojica

customer_reviews.title: For now they are a must.
customer_reviews.text: I have inflamed bowel and diverticulitis. I have drastically changed my diet AND included digestive enzymes as directed by my dietician. She highly recommends Zenwise. I have experienced a reduction in pain, bloating and digestive discomfort. I cannot be sure how much is due to dietary changes and how much is due to these enzymes. However, I will continue to take before meals until all symptoms are gone. I'll experiment later by rolling off them and seeing how I do. For now they are a must.
customer_reviews.author: markb

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped me SO MUCH!!! I can really tell a big difference between when I take it with my meals and when I forget to. I lost my gallbladder about a year ago and still was having a lot of digestive issues. It was very frustrating. Gas, stomach pain and diarrhea; even with a healthy diet. Tums and Gas-x barely touching the symptoms. My friend (nurse) recommended I take this-as it really helped her when she had the same issue. Skeptical, I tried it. And I’m so happy that I did. I rarely need tums after meals now -which had been my dessert for the past year. Highly recommend anyone with issues gives it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: Maybe got a bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: On my second bottle and it’s completely different. The bottle looks different the new formula has an ingredient that my last bottle did not... I can smell it. They are also slightly yellow? My first bottle the pills were all white/grey, odor-less and tasteless. Could this be a defective product?! Nothing is the same. My first bottle would allow me to go regularly when taken in the morning and at dinner but now, not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Healthy life!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I been using Zenwise enzymes for over a year now and I will never switch to any other. My overall digestive health improved and I don't get any stomach ache anymore. I feel great knowing that we get all nutrients from our food now. In today's world when food is loaded with chemicals and fruits and vegetables have no time to develop natural enzymes do to preliminary harvest we need extra enzymes suplement. I recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Polish Girl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I know every person's body reacts differently to things, but this stuff gave me horrible constipation to the point I almost had to go to the hospital. It also gave me a weird smell down under. The minute I stopped taking these, I no longer had a smell. But I'm having to take medicine to get my bowels regulated again. I showed my GI doctor these and he told me to stop taking them and instead have me information on other herbal medicine that'll benefit me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for chronic constipation!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had chronic constipation all of her life. She used to be on the miralax regiment until I learned of the long term issues... So we do what we can, try to eat healthier and drink lots of water. However I got these and we can tell a huge difference!! I've taken them and have loved how regular they make me!!! She does say they taste nasty and need to be coated in something better hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Oreomeg

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s just with my particular body, but these worked horribly for me. If anything they had the opposite effect of what they were supposed to do and made me feel, bloated, gassy and constipated. I couldn’t find my normal probiotic not from a 3P on amazon so I tried these out since they were a decent price - 100% would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dp123

customer_reviews.title: Think twice if you have IBS.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a digestive aid for Exocrine Pancreatic Insufficiency.] I have IBS, and was unaware that Inulin is in this supplement. Inulin is a fructan, with benefits, but causes unpleasant symptoms for me. If you are avoiding FODMAPS, be aware that this product may affect you adversely. Product arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymoose

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Honesty I purchased this because I have a problem of digestion.I was diagnosed with cronhs desease and since then I was afraid to eat some foods Coz it might trigger my crohns.When I saw this and read everything i had to give it a try.And honestly it helps me a lot,before When I tried New foods I Will have a Stomach ache now I Dont have anymore and my Bowel is normal now.Very effective super.I Will highly recommend this product specially if u have problem Like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upset my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I had been using "Source Naturals - Daily Essential Enzymes" for several months. They worked well, but I saw the great reviews for this product and decided to try it. They really upset my stomach on the first day. I tried using them for a couple more days, thinking maybe it was something I ate, as opposed to the enzymes. After the third day, I decided not to use them anymore. I have not had such an upset stomach in several months. I will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: When I first started to intake these pills, I had such high hopes. I began with one a day and gradually stepped it up to two. From the beginning, I had terrible and smelly gas after intake along with bloating. In the hopes my body would get used to it, I persisted in taking them even as I went on vacation. (Apologies to my travel partners.) The gas and bloating did not get better as time went on. Eventually I gave up on the pills. Fast forward to 2 months later, I decided to give them another go and the gas and bloating response is immediately. le sigh
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad side effects
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of food sensitivities and deal with frequent bloating so I figured I would give this a try. The first day I took it, I ended up with worse bloating and a terrible headache. Second day, same thing but felt nauseous too. I thought maybe it was just a coincidence so I continued taking it a third day but the side effects persisted. I very rarely have headaches that last for days. I didn't take any today.. still having bloating but headache is gone now and no nausea. I won't be taking these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Saved Me $150 a Month
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed me IBS medication that cost $300 for a 2 month supply. I couldn't afford it so I decided to try these digestive enzymes. I have been taking them 3 times a day for about a year now and rarely have any stomach problems anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Casebolt

product_meta.title: Zenwise Health Digestive Enzymes Plus Prebiotics & Probiotics Supplement, Vegan Formula for Better Digestion & Lactose Absorption with Amylase & Bromelain, 60 Count
feature_bullets: Achieve digestive comfort today – Zenwise Health Digestive Enzymes are powerful supplements with a natural Enzyme, Prebiotic, and Probiotic blend to promote healthy digestion for men and women.
Immune-Boosting Probiotic – The gut is home to 50% of the body’s immune response, so this supplement features proprietary DE111, a probiotic strain clinically shown to enhance immune system response.
Hard-to-Digest Foods Have Met Their Match – This formula features an Advanced Multi Enzyme System to help you digest fried, spicy, raw, and processed foods, plus dairy and acidic fruits and veggies.

Relieve Gas, Bloating & Discomfort... Before You Eat! – This supplement features Turmeric, Ginger, Green Papaya, Inulin, Apple Pectin, Bladderwrack, Fennel, and Wakame to aid gut health and stomach comfort.

Supports Gut Flora & Enzyme Levels as You Age – The Prebiotic, Probiotics (L-Acidophilus, L-Plantarum, L-Salivarius), and Enzymes support gut bacteria and enzymes your body isn't producing as you age.
